title: Content Creator
description:
We're looking for a experienced content creator making video-essays or documentaries on various interesting topics.

You will be asked to pitch a topic that can produce multiple 8-10 minute videos or a single 15-25 minute video. You'll be compensated $500 - 1,000 depending on the duration of your content that we require from you.
requirements: Able to work on your own
Knowledge on storytelling and high-quality visuals.

title: Scriptwriter
description: We're looking for a experienced Scriptwriter for our VOD-Platform, bySurfTV. You will be given a topic and required to research and write a detailed summarization of the topic.
requirements: 2+ years of experience in scriptwriting for Documentaries
Able to make something complex easily digestable and understandable
Able to work on your own
application_requirements: 2-3 scripts you've worked on before (Google Docs Links only)
